Package skywaysolutions.app.stock

Interface IStockAccessor

All Superinterfaces:
IRepairable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlankController
public interface IStockAccessor extends IRepairable
Provides the stock management system for blanks and tickets.
Author:
Alfred Manville

  • Method Details

    • refreshBlank

      void refreshBlank(long id) throws CheckedException
      Refreshes a blank's cache given the ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A refresh error has occurred.

    • refreshBlankType

      void refreshBlankType(int id) throws CheckedException
      Refreshes a blank type's cache given the ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A refresh error has occurred.

    • createBlank

      void createBlank(long id, long assignedID, String description, Date creationDate, Date assignmentDate) throws CheckedException
      Creates a blank with the specified ID, an ID of a staff member it's assigned to (Not assigned if -1), a description of the blanks contents, the date of the creation and the optional date of assignment (If assigned).
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      assignedID - The staff member ID it is assigned to or -1 if not assigned.
      description - The description of the blank's contents.
      creationDate - The creation date of the blank.
      assignmentDate - The assignment date of the blank (null of not assigned).
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The blank creation operation has failed.

    • returnBlank

      void returnBlank(long id, Date dateReturned) throws CheckedException
      Returns a blank with the specified ID on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      dateReturned - The date returned.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The blank could not be marked as returned.

    • blacklistBlank

      void blacklistBlank(long id) throws CheckedException
      Blacklists a blank with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The blank could not be marked as blacklisted.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.

      CheckedException - The blank could not be marked as voided.

    • reAssignBlank

      void reAssignBlank(long id, long assignedID, Date assignmentDate) throws CheckedException
      Re-assigns a blank with the specified ID to the staff member with the specified ID on the specified date.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the blank.
      assignedID - The ID of the staff member.
      assignmentDate - The date of the re-assignment.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - Blank re-assigning has failed.

      Returns:
      A blank type code.
      Throws:

    • getBlanks

      long[] getBlanks(long assignedID) throws CheckedException
      Gets a list of blanks that may be filtered by a provided staff member ID.
      Parameters:
      assignedID - The staff ID to filter by, -1 for no filtering or -2 for un-assigned.
      Returns:
      The list of blank IDs.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - The blanks could not be retrieved.
